project_id.description: A project ID to filter the response on

billable.description: Filter response on `1` = billable or `0` = non-billable entities

page.description: The page number of the page of results to return, default `1`

per-page.description: The number of items per page, default is `50`

sort.description: A field to sort the list values in the response, ascending (default), pre-fix `-` to apply descending. (Limited fields, varies per endpoint)

fields.description: Comma-delimited set of fields to include in the response
